title: Nama Prabhuâ€™s Lila on Hare Krishna Hill! | Soulful Japa
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Maharaj

segments.key_quote: It's all miraculously the holy name manifested and here, an unbelievable iconic temple stood up in the matter of just nine years.
segments.summary: The speaker describes the miraculous construction of the Hare Krishna temple on Hare Krishna Hill, attributing it to Nama Prabhu's Leela and the power of the holy name.

segments.key_quote: It is the Japa Yajna that built this temple.
segments.summary: The speaker emphasizes the importance of Japa Yajna (chanting) in building the temple and establishing it as a center for spreading Krishna consciousness, Prasadam distribution, and the holy name.

segments.key_quote: And today you see, every day out of 8000 people, at least 2000 people are chanting one round Hare Krishna Mahamantra and walking into Narasimha temple.
segments.summary: The speaker recounts the story of creating 108 steps for chanting and how, despite initial doubts, it became a successful Harinam distribution initiative.

segments.key_quote: In the same way, Nama is coming into your life.
segments.summary: The speaker compares Nama Prabhu entering one's life to installing a deity in the house, emphasizing the constant presence and reciprocation of the holy name.

segments.key_quote: It is nothing but an illusion, an illusion of things.
segments.summary: The speaker briefly touches upon the illusory nature of material existence, encouraging listeners to realize they are living in a 'shantytown' of illusion.
